ModMetaData.name: Lord of the Rims - Hobbits (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Jecrell
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Jecrells mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1400227853
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GYswkZ7.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/LordoftheRimsHobbits
- This is an unofficial port - This will be removed when/if Jecrell comes back
--- Original Description --- Adds Hobbits to RimWorld.
Read our wiki to learn more. https://lord-of-the-rims.wikia.com/wiki/Lord_of_the_Rims_-_Hobbits
Playable Hobbit race Starter Hobbit scenario The Shire as a faction Mountable (with Giddy-Up!) ponies Pipeweed plants which can be harvested into Pipeweed for Hobbits to smoke Also includes Hobbit apparel, backpacks, weapons, doors, walls, and a plantable party tree
JecsTools, DoorsExpanded, and Humanoid Alien Races
Hobbit dress courtesy of Gerrymon https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198089422935/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100 Hobbit cape, shirt and vest, and jacket created by Ennacrima A special thank you to all the producers who made this mod happen: Sole, BaRKy, erdelf, Anton, Oggah, big papa, TheAkbars, ib2grh8, bombadil, Drachir, NanoPaladin, starbucksandchill, Epicurus, Sacriel42.
